laboratory_examinations.findings: Glucose level of 31 mg/dl (1.7 mmol/liter) 30 minutes after birth.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Blood glucose measurements at the age of 20 months showed maximal levels of 181 mg/dl (10 mmol/liter). Daily blood glucose measurements varied between 74.5 mg/dl (4.1 mmol/liter) and 145 mg/dl (8 mmol/liter) two months after insulin treatment was stopped.

laboratory_examinations.findings: Simultaneous insulin level of 172 mU/liter at the time of hypoglycemic episodes.

laboratory_examinations.date: At 20 months of age and 36 months of age
laboratory_examinations.findings: HbA1c was 6.9% at 20 months and decreased to 5.4% at 36 months without treatment.
